statements: SELECT * FROM PatientRecords ORDER BY date_recorded DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis FROM PatientRecords WHERE prescription IS NULL
SELECT * FROM PatientRecords WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT diagnosis, prescription FROM PatientRecords WHERE date_recorded > '2021-01-01'
SELECT patient_id, prescription FROM PatientRecords WHERE diagnosis = 'Flu'
SELECT * FROM PatientRecords WHERE diagnosis = 'Cold';
SELECT record_id, patient_id, date_recorded FROM PatientRecords WHERE prescription = 'Antibiotics' ORDER BY date_recorded DESC;
SELECT diagnosis, COUNT(*) AS diagnosis_count FROM PatientRecords GROUP BY diagnosis HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM PatientRecords WHERE date_recorded BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis FROM PatientRecords WHERE patient_id = '123456' AND diagnosis LIKE '%Fever%';
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM patient_records WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis FROM patient_records ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM patient_records;
SELECT outcome_measure, outcome_value FROM patient_outcomes WHERE outcome_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, diagnosis FROM patient_records WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE patient_age > 50 ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, outcome_measure, outcome_value FROM patient_records JOIN patient_outcomes ON patient_records.patient_id = patient_outcomes.patient_id WHERE outcome_value > 0.5;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, diagnosis, outcome_measure, outcome_value FROM patient_records LEFT JOIN patient_outcomes ON patient_records.patient_id = patient_outcomes.patient_id;
SELECT diagnosis, COUNT(*) as total_count FROM patient_records GROUP BY diagnosis ORDER BY total_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, age FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT * FROM treatments WHERE cost > 1000 ORDER BY treatment_date;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(treatment_id) AS total_treatments FROM treatments GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 40 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, age, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT p.name, t.treatment_name, t.cost FROM patients p INNER JOIN treatments t ON p.patient_id = t.patient_id WHERE t.cost > 100 ORDER BY t.cost DESC;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) as num_treatments FROM treatments GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY num_treatments DESC;
SELECT p.name, o.outcome_description, o.outcome_date FROM patients p INNER JOIN outcomes o ON p.patient_id = o.patient_id WHERE o.outcome_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY o.outcome_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients;
SELECT record_id, doctor_name, record_date FROM Medical_Records;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM Doctors;
SELECT treatment_id, treatment_description FROM Treatments;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Medical_Records ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM Doctors WHERE doctor_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Treatments WHERE treatment_id < 5 ORDER BY treatment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM patient_data;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM patient_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT treatment_type, date_started, date_ended FROM treatment_plans WHERE patient_id = 3;
SELECT lab_test, result_value, result_date FROM lab_results ORDER BY result_date DESC;
SELECT diagnosis, doctor_name, diagnosis_date FROM diagnoses WHERE patient_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM patient_data;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM patient_data ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT name, medical_history FROM patient_data WHERE age > 40;
SELECT * FROM treatment_plans WHERE date_ended IS NULL;
SELECT diagnosis, doctor_name, diagnosis_date FROM diagnoses ORDER BY diagnosis_date ASC;
